entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. High 25. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
